zapaddon.name: Token generation and analysis
zapaddon.description: Allows you to generate and analyze pseudo random tokens, such as those used for session handling or CSRF protection
zapaddon.author: ZAP Dev Team
zapaddon.changes:
Updated to use the latest core changes (Issues 609 and 1104).
Changed to display the messages generated in a table (Issue 503).
Updated add-on dir structure (Issue 1113).
